Summary: clear night 3or 4clouds then it just hovered over us
divs: Sighting Detailsit was a beautiful night so my grandpa, my uncle and I were looking at the stars sitting on our bench in the front yard.Then the object just hovered over us heading north west.We instantly thought it was a U.F.O.It didn't really change our lives much.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Sierra Vista
There were no other sightings in Sierra Vista on or around June 17th 2008
